sentences.en: Come along, someone must want to know my invention.
sentences.cn: 再努力想想看, 肯定会有人对我的发明感兴趣.

sentences.en: Fax machines were a wonderful invention at the time.
sentences.cn: 传真机在当时是一项了不起的发明。
这是一项极其有用的发明.

sentences.en: It's been a tricky business marketing his new invention.
sentences.cn: 推广他的新发明一直是件棘手的事情。

sentences.en: Tell us how you lit upon the idea for your invention.
sentences.cn: 请告诉我们,你是怎么想到你那个发明的.

sentences.en: The dishwasher is a wonderful invention.
sentences.cn: 洗碗机是一项奇妙的发明。

sentences.en: The invention of printing helped the diffusion of learning.
sentences.cn: 印刷术的发明有助于知识的传播.

sentences.en: The invention of the computer has revolutionized the business world.
sentences.cn: 电脑的发明使商界发生了根本变化。

sentences.en: The new invention ensures the beer keeps a full, frothy head.
sentences.cn: 这项新发明能保证啤酒始终保持丰富的泡沫。

sentences.en: They attributed the success of their invention to Engineer Huang.
sentences.cn: 他们把发明的成功归于黄工程师.

sentences.en: They demonstrated the new invention to us.
sentences.cn: 他们向我们演示了他们的新发明.

sentences.en: They subsequently admitted that the story was pure invention.
sentences.cn: 他们后来承认他们说的纯属虚构。

sentences.en: This invention is ascribed to Edison.
sentences.cn: 这项发明被认为是属于爱迪生的.

sentences.en: This safety invention will eject the pilot from a burning plane.
sentences.cn: 这个安全装置会把飞行员从燃烧着的飞机中弹出.

sentences.en: To be a good story - writer a person needs invention.
sentences.cn: 要当优秀小说家,就必须有创作才能.

sentences.en: You can't fault them for lack of invention.
sentences.cn: 你不能因为他们缺乏创新就指责他们。

sentences.en: Your invention is clever, but not practical.
sentences.cn: 你的发明很巧, 但不实用.

trans.tran_en: a useful machine, tool, instrument etc that has been invented
